SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AccountUI
Static UI boundary class for manageing user interface for login, logout and changePassword functionalities
Camp
Represents a camp where all attributes are private.
CampController
Static control class for interfacing with the UI classes to handle all requests regarding camps.
CAMS
Main entry point into CAMS app
CommitteeMember
Represents a committee member who is a sub-class of a student.
CommitteeUI
User interface boundary class for CommitteeMember
DataController
Stores real-time data of all camps, staff, students and commitee members in memory Acts as run-time database Reads tab-seperated values
DisplayHandler
Handles the displaying and printing of information onto the terminal.
EditableMessage
Sub-interface of Message Has a method to allow it to edit the content of Message
Enquiry
Concrete class for EditableMessage Represents an enquiry with an owner who is a Student, and a ArrayList of replies under this enquiry
EnquiryController
Static control class for interfacing with the UI classes to handle all requests regarding Enquiry.
Faculty
An enumeration of all the faculties/schools in NTU PACE CoE CoHASS CoS GraduateCollege LKCMedicine NBS NIE RSIS ADM SBS CCEB CEE SCSE EEE SOH MSE MAE SPMS SSS ASE WKWSCI NTU The "NTU" option represents the entire school
InputHandler
Handles the input handling from user, so only one scanner is needed across the entire application.
Message
An interface which represents a message.
Reply
A non-editable message Contains the ownerID as a String and the content as a String
ReportController
Static class to help with generating reports for Staff and CommitteeMember
RoleController
Static class which handles the conversion of User type when Student becomes a CommitteeMember and vice versa
SearchController
Static class for handling filtering of camps based on attributes like campName startDate endDate faculty location attendeeName commMemberName
SessionInfo
Helper class to store runtime information about current user Stores sessionInfo about cuurent User
Staff
Represents a staff who is a sub-class of User Has a ArrayList to store all the camps they have created
StaffUI
User interface boundary class for Staff
Status
An enumeration of all the statuses of a suggestion.
Student
Represents a student who is a sub-class of User Has a ArrayList to store all the camps they have signed up for, both as attendee and committee member
StudentUI
User interface boundary class for Student
Suggestion
Concrete class for EditableMessage Represents an sugesstion with an owner who is a Student, and a status of type Status
SuggestionController
Static control class for interfacing with all UI classes and handling requests regardingSuggestion
User
An abstract class which represents a user of the CAMS system The default password is "password"
UserController
Static class for handling the login, logout and changePassword for User
